paper_abstract: This paper is concerned with the robust stabilization problem for a large class of parameterized switched nonlinear systems interconnected with unmodeled dynamics and uncertain disturbance in cascade form. Adaptive approximation methods will be designed to address the unknown nonlinearities. Via the backstepping algorithm, we construct adaptive state-feedback controller under certain conditions, which is robust against parametric uncertainties and enable the class of switched systems stabilized under arbitrary switchings in probability. The simulation results demonstrate that the asymptotic stability of system performance can be adjusted by choosing suitable design parameters. Copyright (c) 2014 John Wiley & Sons, Ltd.
paper_title: Robust stabilization design for large-scale parameterized nonlinear switched systems
